title: Risou No Kanojo
alternative_title: 理想の彼女 ; Riso no Kanojo ; Ideal Girlfriend ;Ideal Girlfriend (MORI Marimo)
status: 理想の彼女 ; Riso no Kanojo ; Ideal Girlfriend ;Ideal Girlfriend (MORI Marimo)
description:
Description :
        Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone.Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!?What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose…!!? A love comedy about a young lady disguising herself, and a boy in an enviable situation!(Source: ComicWalker)Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.---**Links:**- Alternative Official Raw - (https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67455)
